If in doubt please keep your child home.

Update: 7.23.2020
ALL HOGS HAVE SOLD. Thank you to all!

Due to the cancellation of the Berrien County Youth Fair, our FFA students, who have been raising hogs since they were farrowed on our campus in early February, now need a new outlet for selling the hogs. If you wish to purchase a hog, they will be sold for $250 per hog; but the buyer would be responsible for paying the processing fee. The processing fee is approximately $1/lb of the cut weight. Our best estimate would put the processing fee at an additional $170 (a grand total of around $420). If you would like to choose your own processor, we would be happy to transport the animal to your place of choice. All buyers will be responsible for picking up their meat. If you‚Äôre interested in purchasing a hog, feel free to leave a comment below, or contact Steve Rigoni at srigoni@countrysideacademy.org. Hogs will be ready for travel to the processor by July 27, 2020.
